alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:28AM EST until January 28 at 7:41PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Dan River near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, the sewage treatment plant near Danville, Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near Wentworth. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Dan Valley Road and River Road in Madison are closed by floodwaters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Sunday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 19.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather. gov/safety/flood The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM EST.
